text: The Cadillac Escalade is a SUV. It has been made from 1998 to the present day by General Motors. == First generation (1998–2000) == The first-generation Escalade was made from 1998 to 2000 by General Motors. === Gallery === File:1st-Cadillac-Escalade.jpg|1999-2000 Cadillac Escalade File:2000 Cadillac Escalade Luxury 5.7L L31, rear 6.6.20.jpg|2000 Cadillac Escalade rear == Second generation (2001–2006) == The second-generation Escalade was made from 2001 to 2006 by General Motors. === Gallery === File:2005 Cadillac Escalade Front.jpg|2005 Cadillac Escalade File:Cadillac Escalade (52049530071) (cropped).jpg|Cadillac Escalade == Third generation (2006–2014) == The third- generation Escalade was made from 2006 to 2014 by General Motors. === Gallery === File:Cadillac Escalade 6.2 V8 Sport Luxury (III) – Frontansicht, 30. August 2012, Düsseldorf.jpg|Cadillac Escalade File:Cadillac Escalade 6.2 V8 Sport Luxury (III) – Heckansicht, 30. August 2012, Düsseldorf.jpg|Cadillac Escalade rear == Fourth generation (2014–2020) == The fourth-generation Escalade was made from 2014Next-gen Cadillac Escalade debuting October 7 in NYC from Autoblog (August 14, 2013) to 2020 by General Motors. === Gallery === File:2018 Cadillac Escalade ESV Platinum front 4.6.19.jpg|2018 Cadillac Escalade ESV File:2015 Cadillac Escalade ESV Premium, rear 8.31.19.jpg|2015 Cadillac Escalade ESV rear == Fifth generation (2020–present) == The fifth- generation Escalade is made from 2020 to the present day. It is made by General Motors. === Gallery === File:2021 Cadillac Escalade Premium Luxury, front 3.7.22.jpg|2021 Cadillac Escalade File:2021 Cadillac Escalade Premium Luxury, rear 3.7.22.jpg|2021 Cadillac Escalade rear ==References== ==Other websites== * Cadillac Escalade on Cadillac.com Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Escalade Category:Pickup trucks Category:Sport utility vehicles
